title: Deserter

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, frame someone making them appear as a Deserter for the night.
- When someone you framed is visited, you appear as a good role for the night.
- You can frame evil roles to make them appear as a random good role for the night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - If you are visited while you appear innocent, the Climax becomes "*The protagonist steals the company medic's civilian clothes and scatters off into the night. Shots fire behind them, one piercing their ear and shoulder, but they scamper into a bog and hide underwater. The next day, they arrive in a foreign town, unsure of the language anyone speaks.*" When the story is completed with this climax, you frame all players as the Deserter, changing all of their role names and numbers to 3338 Deserter (but not their role abilities.) All wills are cleansed.

desc:
Post 3338
"*I don't want to be here. What happened to all the ball games and royal parades in the city? There's no point in protecting the plantations if they never get attacked.*"
